mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Quest (q_title, q_content, u_id, q_option) VALUES (#{q_title}, #{q_content}, #{u_id}, #{q_option})
mapper.select: SELECT q_number, q_title, q_content, q_date, u_id FROM Quest ORDER BY q_number DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{records}
SELECT q.q_number, q.q_title, q.q_content, q.q_date, q.u_id, f.f_id fileId, f.f_name fileName FROM Quest q LEFT JOIN File f ON q.q_number = f.q_number WHERE q.q_number = #{q_number}
